resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106404</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106404</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Women, Their Rights and Nothing Less</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen, ihre Rechte und nichts kleiner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes, leurs droites et rien moins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres, suas direitas e nada menos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne, i loro diritti e niente di meno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες, τα δικαιώματά τους και τίποτα λιγότεροι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres, las sus derechas y nada menos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson that uses primary documents to help students (Grades 9-12) learn about the women's suffrage movement that began in the 1840s and led to women's right to vote nationwide in 1920.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Lektion, die Primärdokumente benutzt, um zu 
helfen, Kursteilnehmer (Grade 9-12) erlernen über die 
Stimmrechtbewegung der Frauen, die im 1840s und zu der Frauen zur 
Stimme im ganzen Land 1920 nach rechts geführt anfing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une leçon qui emploie les documents primaires 
pour aider des étudiants (catégories 9-12) se renseignent sur le 
mouvement du suffrage des femmes qui a commencé dans le 1840s et 
mené aux femmes juste à la voix dans tout le pays en 1920.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lição que use originais preliminares ajudar 
estudantes (classes 9-12) aprende sobre o movimento do suffrage das 
mulheres que começou no 1840s e conduzido às mulheres para a direita
ao voto por todo o país em 1920.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lezione che usa i documenti primari per 
aiutare allievi (gradi 9-12) impara circa il movimento di suffrage 
delle donne che ha cominciato nel 1840s e condotto alle donne a destra
al voto in tutta la nazione in 1920.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μάθημα που χρησιμοποιεί τα αρχικά έγγραφα για να 
βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές (βαθμοί 9-12) να μάθουν για τη 
μετακίνηση ψήφου των γυναικών που άρχισε στο 1840s και οδήγησε
στο δικαίωμα των γυναικών ψηφοφορίας σε εθνικό επίπεδο το 
1920.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una lección que utiliza documentos primarios para
ayudar los estudiantes (grados 9-12) aprende sobre el movimiento del 
sufragio de las mujeres que comenzó en el 1840s y conducido a las 
mujeres a la derecha al voto por toda la nación en 1920.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106404</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/women-their-rights-and-nothing-less</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
